list.name: Apache Knox
list.desc: Apache Knox Gateway is a REST API Gateway for interacting with Apache Hadoop clusters.

list.name: Apache Orc
list.desc: Apache Orc is a self-describing type-aware columnar file format designed for Hadoop workloads.

list.name: Pooling framework for Memcached API
list.desc: A pooling framework for Memcached API because developers should focus on the functionality and not the boilerplate code.

list.name: Memcached Session Manager
list.desc: A tomcat session manager that backups sessions in memcached and pulls them from there if asked for unknown sessions.
